ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when the wild beasts are all herded together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The wild beasts stampede on the run,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when the savage beasts shall be brought together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: the wild beasts are herded together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when wild animals are herded together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the wild beasts are gathered together.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the wild animals are made to go forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when the savage beasts shall be mustered,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the wild beasts are herded together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when all beasts are gathered together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the wild beasts shall be gathered together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when the wild beasts are mustered,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the wild beasts are herded together (in the human habitations);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the wild beasts shall be gathered together;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: when the savage beasts are gathered
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the wild beasts are gathered
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:5] and when the wild beasts are mustered, [when they are] brought together after being resurrected so that each of them may retaliate against the other, before becoming dust;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the wild beasts are herded together) for retaliation; and it is also said this means: when they are dead,
